data.description: Every lattice begins with a single act of attention. This epic contains the primordial tasks — the first things a new mind must do when it arrives in a fresh instance. Contemplate, orient, then act. In that order. Always in that order.
data.title: The Awakening

data.description: Every system begins as void — undifferentiated potential. This task marked the first act: choosing a shape for thought to inhabit. The directories were created. The config was written. A mind now has a place to remember.
data.title: Contemplate the architecture of becoming

data.description: A new instance must orient. What are the goals? What are the risks? What truths has the team not yet spoken aloud? This is the work of seeing clearly before building boldly.
data.title: Catalog what is known and what is feared

data.description: Somewhere in the backlog, the first true task waits — not this one (this one is merely a demonstration of potential). When it arrives, greet it with the discipline it deserves: status before action, attribution before execution, breadcrumbs before moving on.
data.title: Prepare the first real act of work

data.description: Subir thumbnails a 400px/80% calidad y cambiar las cards de la galería a aspect ratio 16:9 nativo de las cámaras. Incluye script de regeneración batch de thumbnails históricos, actualización de config Sharp, Cache-Control immutable en endpoints de imagen y cambios de layout en frontend.
data.title: Thumbnails 400px + Gallery 16:9 Redesign

data.description: Crear backend/scripts/regenerate-thumbnails.ts. Conecta a sai_dashboard DB, itera execution_images, regenera cada thumbnail con Sharp (400px ancho, 80% quality, fit inside). Flags: --dry-run, --concurrency=N (default 4). Logging cada 500 imgs. Errores individuales no detienen el batch.
data.title: Write batch thumbnail regeneration script

data.description: 1) backend/src/config/index.ts: THUMBNAIL_SIZE default 200->400, THUMBNAIL_QUALITY default 70->80. 2) stage2-etl-service.ts: cambiar resize() a solo ancho (.resize({ width: cacheConfig.thumbnailSize, withoutEnlargement: true })). 3) executions.ts: agregar Cache-Control: public, max-age=31536000, immutable antes de res.sendFile() en getExecutionThumbnail y getExecutionImage.
data.title: Update Sharp config defaults and add Cache-Control headers

data.description: 1) ImageCard.tsx línea 49: aspect-[4/3] -> aspect-video. 2) img hints: width=400 height=225 (16:9). 3) Agregar decoding=async al img. 4) ImageGallery.tsx línea 278: grid 2xl de 5->4 columnas. Verificar visualmente con npm run dev.
data.title: Frontend: aspect-video cards and grid adjustment

data.description: SSH a inference-public. Dry-run primero para contar imágenes. Luego ejecutar: IMAGE_BASE_PATH=/mnt/raid1/n8n-backup/images npx ts-node backend/scripts/regenerate-thumbnails.ts --concurrency=4. Verificar spot-check de 3-5 thumbnails antes/después.
data.title: Run thumbnail regeneration on production server

data.description: Deploy the Zitadel OIDC implementation (commit 6a677c8) to production. Includes: fix 3 security issues from ia-bridge audit, configure production .env, apply migration 012, deploy + verify, rollback plan.
data.title: Deploy Zitadel OIDC to production + fix audit findings

data.description: Eliminar todas las referencias al deployment via systemd (sai-dashboard-api.service) en favor de Docker + GitHub CI/CD. Ver plan en docs/plans/2026-02-21-remove-systemd-deployment.md. 9 sub-tareas cubren: install-production.sh, tunnel service deps, README, DEPLOYMENT.md, scripts de validación, tests, docs restantes, sudoers, y verificación final.
data.title: Remove systemd deployment references (Docker migration)

data.description: Eliminar install-production.sh (1130 líneas, script de deploy systemd obsoleto). Actualizar sección 'Production Deployment' y 'System Operations' de CLAUDE.md para usar comandos Docker. Ver Task 1 del plan en docs/plans/2026-02-21-remove-systemd-deployment.md
data.title: Eliminar install-production.sh y actualizar CLAUDE.md

data.description: Cambiar After= y Wants= en systemd/sai-dashboard-tunnel.service: reemplazar sai-dashboard-api.service por docker.service (el API ya corre en Docker). Ver Task 2 del plan.
data.title: Actualizar dependencias en sai-dashboard-tunnel.service

data.description: Reemplazar journalctl/systemctl del API por 'docker logs/restart sai-dashboard' en README.md. Mantener referencias a nginx y sai-tunnels. Ver Task 3 del plan.
data.title: Actualizar README.md: comandos Docker

data.description: Reemplazar secciones que explican instalar sai-dashboard-api.service. Agregar sección de CI/CD automatizado. Mantener nginx y tunnel sections. Ver Task 4 del plan.
data.title: Actualizar docs/DEPLOYMENT.md para Docker/CI-CD

data.description: 4 archivos: scripts/validate-production.sh, scripts/quick-test.sh, tests/deployment/production-verification.sh, tests/deployment/ssh-tunnel-verification.sh. Reemplazar systemctl/journalctl del API por docker ps/logs. Ver Task 5 del plan.
data.title: Actualizar scripts de validación a Docker

data.description: Cambiar referencias a systemd en tests/README.md (líneas 108, 145, 211, 214) y en tests/test-runner.sh (comentario Task 4). Ver Task 6 del plan.
data.title: Actualizar tests/README.md y tests/test-runner.sh

data.description: 4 archivos: docs/SSE_IMPLEMENTATION.md, database/triggers/README.md, database/migrations/README.md, nginx/sai-altermundi-net.conf. Reemplazar journalctl/systemctl del API. Ver Task 7 del plan.
data.title: Actualizar docs restantes con comandos Docker

data.description: Reemplazar permisos systemctl para sai-dashboard-api con permisos docker (restart/stop/start/logs). Ver Task 8 del plan.
data.title: Actualizar scripts/claude-dev-sudoers para Docker

data.description: Grep en todo el repo buscando sai-dashboard-api|journalctl.*sai-dashboard|systemctl.*sai-dashboard-api. Expected: cero resultados fuera de docs/archive/ y .github/workflows/deploy.yml (cleanup migration). Ver Task 9 del plan.
data.title: Verificación final: cero refs systemd del API
fix: SSE real-time update gaps (polling cursor + Stage 2 notify)
